price: Hakika Sisi tumekuteremshia Qur'ani kidogo kidogo.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِيلٗا
footnotes: Hakika Sisi, kwa rehema yetu na hikima yetu, tumekuteremshia wewe Qur'ani kwa njia ya kukutuza moyo wako, na uweze daima kuihifadhi, basi huto isahau kabisa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā ʿalayka al-qur'āna tanzīlan
